channel.title: Bulletin on ​Lutheran Church of the Living Christ
channel.description: Recent content in Bulletin on ​Lutheran Church of the Living Christ

item.title: Blankets
item.description: Over the past few years, some of us have been gathering together in the fall to make fleece blankets (NO SEWING REQUIRED) to give to area individuals and families in need of something to help keep them warm in the upcoming colder weather. Although any size is OK, we have made blankets in the past that are about 2 and half yards long. Due to additional responsibilities for Pastor Spies in serving two congregations, we do not have any selected evenings scheduled for group blanket making this year.

item.title: Food Pantry
item.description: Volunteers are needed for the Menomonee Falls Food Pantry on Tuesday, October 24 & Thursday, October 26. Hours are 11:45-2:00 p.m. and 4:45-7:00 p.m. each day. Please see the bulletin board for the sign-up sheet. Food donations can be dropped off at their convenient drop off entry 24 hours a day or left in the box in our narthex. A list of food pantry needs is posted on the bulletin board.

item.title: Chili Bake Sale
item.description: Mark your calendars for Saturday, November 4 from 9:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. for our annual chili/bake sale along with the Christmas Holiday Shoppe. We will need lots of chili, baked goods and HELP! Please see the sign-up sheets posted on the bulletin board.
